name: Hill Racer-Fly & Run the Ball
description:
Race down the hill, and compete against others in an addicting, thrilling, free high flying ball race.

Tap Tap your way to the top by beating your opponents and being the first to the finish line in this ultramarathon ball race down the dunes!

Do you have what it takes to smash your rivals? Will you be the first to jump past the hills Install now to get rolling downhill!

Install now to enjoy this amazing racer brought to you by Tap Tap Games by Huuuge!
